vendor_name: Intercontinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong by IHG
title: Hong Kong Elegance with Victoria Harbour Views, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Club Lounge Access
description:
In one of Hong Kong's most sought-after neighbourhoods, discover sweeping skylines and refined comfort along the iconic Victoria Harbour. Look out over the water from a sleek and spacious room, offering front-row seats to the nightly Symphony of Lights and the ideal spot to retreat to after exploring popular Tsim Sha Tsui's galleries, markets and waterside promenades.

Spend your days lounging by the glittering outdoor pool perched above the city, and evenings downstairs at Tiffany's New York Bar for a dose of Manhattan glamour and one of Hong Kong's most impressive whiskey collections. Club InterContinental access adds an extra layer of indulgence, with gourmet breakfasts, afternoon teas and evening cocktails served in an exclusive harbourview lounge.

Dining is a highlight here, with options that range from refined Cantonese dishes served in the courtyard-style surrounds of Hoi King Heen to handmade pastas and regional Italian classics at The Mistral. This is Hong Kong at its most polished - where international elegance meets local buzz.
location_description: InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 70 Mody Road, Tsimshatsui East Kowloon, Hong Kong

title: Spectacular City Stay with Club Access Included
description: Stay in the heart of Hong Kong’s Kowloon commercial and entertainment district at the Gateway Hotel by Marco Polo. Housed in Harbour City, Hong Kong’s largest shopping complex, you’ll have fantastic dining and retail destinations at your fingertips. VIP treatment is guaranteed with exclusive Continental Club Lounge access, offering complimentary breakfast, nightly free-flow fine wines and chef-crafted canapés, and all-day tea and coffee. Other great benefits include 15% off food and beverages at Three on Canton restaurant, a late 1pm checkout and a complimentary daily mini bar with soft drinks and beer.
offer_address: 13 Canton Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

title: Five-Star Hong Kong Kowloon Escape with Outdoor Gin Bar & Award-Winning Restaurant
description: Stay in the heart of Mongkok, Kowloon at the five-star Cordis Hong Kong. Explore the exquisite dining options onsite, from sipping gin under the stars at The Garage Bar or savouring authentic Cantonese cuisine paired with exceptional wines at the award-winning Ming Court. When the need to unwind hits, enjoy a rejuvenating body scrub or relaxing full-body massage at Chuan Spa, or float away in the heated rooftop swimming pool, complete with underwater audio for a truly relaxing swim.
offer_address: 555 Shanghai Street, Mongkok, Kowloon 999077, Hong Kong

title: Five-Star Hong Kong Harbourfront Opulence with Four Acclaimed Eateries
description: Within the city's electric center is the Regent Hong Kong, a sophisticated sanctuary boasting an enviable location at the fore of Victoria Harbour. Here, guests have a front row seat to the nightly 'Symphony of Lights' show that illuminates the skyline -  that is, if they can pry themselves away from the hotel's four world-class restaurants long enough. Rebalance your mind and body while floating in rooftop infinity spa pools or recharge in the 24-hour fitness centre at this five-star retreat.
offer_address: 18 Salisbury Road Regent, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

title: Hong Kong Opulence in the Heart of Tsim Sha Tsui with Three Michelin-Star Restaurant, Spa & Rooftop Pool
description: Experience timeless elegance at The Langham Hong Kong, located in the heart of bustling Tsim Sha Tsui. At this world-class hotel, indulge in the finest Cantonese cuisine at the three-Michelin-starred T'ang Court, or savour cocktails at Artesian. Venture out to explore the nearby Kowloon Park or the iconic Victoria Harbour. Unwind in the Chuan Body + Soul wellness sanctuary, or take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool overlooking the city's glittering skyline.
offer_address: 8 Peking Road, Tsim Sha Tsui, Kowloon, Hong Kong

vendor_name: Intercontinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong by IHG
title: Five-Star Hong Kong InterContinental Luxury in Vibrant Tsim Sha Tsui District
description: Escape to InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong, a five-star retreat in the vibrant Tsim Sha Tsui district perched on Hong Kong's iconic waterfront. On your doorstep, you’ll find the high-end boutiques of Canton Road, the city's largest shopping mall - Harbour City - and plenty of restaurants to delight. Within the award-winning hotel, feast on Michelin-starred fare, plunge into the glistening pool or keep up your fitness routine in the 24-hour gym.
location_description: InterContinental Grand Stanford Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 70 Mody Road, Tsimshatsui East Kowloon, Hong Kong

title: Contemporary Hong Kong Escape in Heart of Kowloon near Iconic Victoria Harbour
description: Experience the hustle and bustle of Kowloon’s city centre at the modern Holiday Inn Golden Mile Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel. Positioned a mere five minutes away from the iconic Victoria Harbour, the hotel boasts access to Hong Kong’s major commercial and tourist districts via the nearby Mass Transit Railway (MTR). Take in the city's historic landmarks and vibrant dining scene on your doorstep, before retreating back for an evening cocktail, tranquil swim and dinner at the onsite renowned restaurants.
location_description: Holiday Inn Golden Mile Hong Kong, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 50 Nathan Rd, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong

title: Stylish Hong Kong Creative Sanctuary with Award-Winning Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Kowloon from this stylish and sustainable retreat in the heart of Hong Kong. Just steps from the MTR station within the bustling Jordan district, Eaton HK, Langham Hospitality Group, is perfectly positioned for exploring the Temple Street Night Market, Jade Market and the historic Tin Hau Temple.

Within the hotel, savour innovative Cantonese cuisine at Yat Tung Heen, enjoy sustainable cocktails at Terrible Baby or find tranquillity in the rooftop pool. Enjoy a host of amenities to make this escape a relaxing and memorable one.
offer_address: 380 Nathan Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong, Hong Kong
